name: Ai ai Aide
lyrics:
Ai ai Aide
ai, ai, aidê,
Joga bonito que eu quero ver
Ai, ai, aidê.
Joga bonito que eu quero aprender
Ai, ai, aidê.

translations.text:
Ai ai Aide
ai, ai, aidê,
Play beautifully because I want to see
Ai, ai, aidê.
Play beautifully because I want to learn
Ai, ai, aidê.

descriptions.text: This song is frequently directed at players who are making mistakes or generally playing sloppily in the roda. It can also be sung as a celebration of a great game in progress.
Ez a dal gyakran olyan játékosoknak szól, akik hibákat követnek el, vagy általában hanyagul játszanak a rodában. Illetve énekelhető ha nagyot fejlődik a játék (??)
